constraint.description: Slf4j logger must be used for logging
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[invocation:INVOKES]->(:Method)<-[:DECLARES]-(logger:Type:Logger) WHERE NOT logger:Slf4j RETURN type as Type, invocation as Invocation, logger as InvalidLogger ORDER BY invocation.lineNumber

concept.description: Identifies the loggers used in the application
concept.cypher: MATCH (logger:Type:Logger) RETURN logger ORDER BY logger.fqn

concept.description: Identifies the Slf4j loggers used in the application
concept.cypher: MATCH (logger:Type{fqn:"org.slf4j.Logger"}) SET logger:Logger:Slf4j RETURN logger ORDER BY logger.fqn

concept.description: Identifies the Logback loggers used in the application
concept.cypher: MATCH (logger:Type{fqn:"ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger"}) SET logger:Logger:Logback RETURN logger ORDER BY logger.fqn
